Package groupOne.game

Class S_Entity

java.lang.Object
groupOne.game.Entity
groupOne.game.S_Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
OBJ_Bonus, OBJ_Damage, OBJ_Door, OBJ_Gate, OBJ_Reward
public abstract class S_Entity extends Entity
Abstract Class for stationary entities such as Doors, Rewards, etc. to extend. Contains fields for collision, array index and a method for destructable entities to implement
